wikipedia_page.main: Douglas James Smyth Crozier, CMG (20 March 1908 – 17 November 1976) was a British teacher, civil servant and the Director of Education of Hong Kong.

response: | align=center rowspan=2| 8 || rowspan=2| 80px || rowspan=2| Douglas James Smyth Crozier高詩雅 || rowspan=2| 1950 || rowspan=2| 28 April 1961 ||

link_mentions.page: King George V School, Hong Kong
response: *Crozier (green) – named after Douglas James Smyth Crozier, a KGV teacher who fought to defend Hong Kong in WWII, and whom went on to serve as the Director of Education of Hong Kong, served on the Executive Council of Hong Kong, and was an official member of the Legislative Council of Hong Kong; during the 50's and 60's.
* Douglas James Smyth Crozier – former Director of Education of Hong Kong
*Douglas James Smyth Crozier (1908-1976), a British educator and later Secretary for Education in Hong Kong post-war
